title: Wupatki National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Wupatki Pueblo in different lights. NPS Photos (H.Rich)   Â   Scenic Drive and Trails  The scenic drive is open year round, day and night. The Wukoki, Lomaki, and Citadel trails are open from sunrise to sunset.  The Visitor Center  The Wupatki visitor center is open is open all year, except  December 25.   Hours:  9:00 AM - 5:00 PM MST NOTE: Most of Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time. We stay on Mountain Standard Time year-round.
